entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
